guiTeacher.components

Class RadioButtons

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiTeacher.components.Component
      • guiTeacher.components.StyledComponent
        • guiTeacher.components.RadioButtons
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Visible

    public class RadioButtons
extends StyledComponent
implements Clickable
    A simplified implementation of a group of RadioButton. Visually, this group has a label above it defining the overall group of Buttons
    Author:
    bnockles

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadioButtons

        public RadioButtons(int x,
                    int y,
                    int w,
                    int h,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String[] descriptions,
                    int defaultButton,
                    int style)
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate within context of parent ComponentContainer
        y - y-coordinate within context of parent ComponentContainer
        w - width of all the buttons
        h - height of all the buttons
        name - Description above all buttons
        descriptions - the desciption for each individual button
        defaultButton - corresponds to the index of one of the descriptions in the previous parameter, this defines the initial RadioButton
        style - can be RadioButtons.STYLE_HORIZONTAL or _VERTICAL
